## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] UI / styling update

## Checklist

- [ ] I tested in at least two browser tabs with a live WebRTC call
- [ ] I checked the browser console for errors (DevTools > Console)
- [ ] I verified the change works on both desktop and mobile viewports
- [ ] I tested in Chrome and at least one other browser (Firefox, Safari, or Edge)
- [ ] No external dependencies added (vanilla JS, no build step)
- [ ] CSS changes use custom properties from `:root` where appropriate
- [ ] README updated if adding a new user-facing feature

## Breaking Changes

Does this change break any existing behavior (signaling, media flow, UI)? If yes, describe what users or deployers need to update.

## Testing Notes

Describe how you tested this. Include browser versions, network setup (same LAN vs. different networks), and any edge cases you verified.

## Screenshots / Recording

If the change is visual, include before/after screenshots or a screen recording.
